poem:
Title: "Pledges Framed in Distant Shadows"

In cold dawn the AfD threats take form,
A jigsaw vote, O harsh and uncertain storm.
The ardent Weidel coyly warms,
To the Brexit-modelled swarm.
Yet, as UK parted curtains to an unknown scheme,
What's "dead right" finds life in someone's dream.
Yet spun and woven, in a disparate thread,
Whose tapestry weaves the future we dread?
